column2: The Knahaten Flu will appear at the very earliest in the year 3525, and 25 years after the game has started. After one major outbreak the epidemic will become endemic.
The Knahaten Flu will appear at the very earliest 50 years after the game has started, and might reappear 500 years after game start. After one major outbreak the epidemic will become endemic.
The Knahaten Flu will appear in the year 3480 and follow its historical route.
The Knahaten Flu will appear frequently and be extraordinarily deadly. §RWARNING: This setting is not recommended for a normal game!§!
